mapper.select: select s.styling_vote_seq, dd.ddate, nvl(cc.voter,0) voter, nvl(cc.dnum,0) dnum, s.styling_title, s.styling_writer, s.styling_writedate, s.styling_viewcount, s.styling_end,s.styling_endterm,s.styling_voternum,s.photo,u.name as styling_writername from styling_vote s join users u on s.styling_writer = u.seq and s.styling_delete_flag='n' LEFT OUTER join (select sv.styling_vote_seq,sv.styling_endterm, (sv.styling_endterm - to_date(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd')) ddate from styling_vote sv, dual where sv.styling_end = 1)dd on s.styling_vote_seq = dd.styling_vote_seq LEFT OUTER join (select sv.styling_vote_seq, sv.styling_voternum, su.voter as voter, (sv.styling_voternum-su.voter) dnum from styling_vote sv , (select styling_vote_seq, count(*)voter from styling_vote_user group by styling_vote_seq)su where sv.styling_vote_seq = su.styling_vote_seq)cc on s.styling_vote_seq = cc.styling_vote_seq order by s.styling_writedate desc

select s.styling_vote_seq, s.styling_title, s.styling_contents, s.styling_writer, s.styling_writedate, s.styling_viewcount, s.styling_end,s.styling_endterm,s.styling_voternum,s.photo,u.name as styling_writername from styling_vote s,users u where s.styling_writer = u.seq and s.styling_vote_seq = #{styling_vote_seq}
select count(*) from styling_vote_user where styling_vote_seq= #{styling_vote_seq} and user_seq=#{seq}
mapper.update: update styling_vote set styling_delete_flag = 'y' where styling_vote_seq= #{styling_vote_seq}

update styling_vote set styling_title= #{styling_title}, styling_contents= #{styling_contents},styling_end=#{styling_end},styling_endterm=#{styling_endterm,jdbcType=DATE},styling_voternum=#{styling_voternum,jdbcType=INTEGER},photo=#{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},styling_lastdate=sysdate where styling_vote_seq=#{styling_vote_seq}
update styling_vote set styling_viewcount =(nvl(styling_viewcount,0)+1) where styling_vote_seq = #{styling_vote_seq}
mapper.select: select vr.*, round(vr.eachcount/vr.totalcount*100,2)eachrate from(select vote_value, count(*) eachcount,(select count(*)from styling_vote_user where styling_vote_seq=#{styling_vote_seq})totalcount from styling_vote_user where styling_vote_seq =#{styling_vote_seq}group by vote_value)vr order by vr.vote_value
